name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Mid/Senior Node.js Developer with extensive expertise in **Node.js** and **Golang**, delivering scalable solutions and robust serverless architectures. Proficient in **Docker** for containerization, ensuring smooth deployment and operations in cloud environments. Experienced in **SQL** and **AzureSQL** database management, alongside **Redis** for efficient data storage and retrieval. Skilled in building and maintaining queuing systems, implementing **Integration testing** and **Unit testing** to ensure high-quality code. Recognized for seamless integration in teams through **Git**, managing version control and collaboration effectively. Additionally, well-versed in frontend technologies including **Angular** and **Next.js**. A dedicated professional with a strong commitment to technical documentation and continuous improvement, bringing a passion for clean, efficient code and complex problem-solving in diverse sectors like healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable server-side applications using **Node.js**, enhancing system performance by 50% and reducing response times to under **200ms**.
• Implemented **Docker** for containerization of applications, which streamlined deployment processes and increased deployment efficiency by 70%.
• Designed and implemented serverless solutions on **Azure**, reducing infrastructure costs by **30%** while maintaining high availability.
• Created and maintained SQL databases, including **AzureSQL**, ensuring data integrity and accessibility with a **30%** improvement in query response times.
• Leveraged **Redis** for caching mechanisms, optimizing data retrieval and enhancing performance by **40%**.
• Developed queuing systems with **RabbitMQ**, ensuring message delivery success rates of **99.5%** and improving the overall application resilience.
• Conducted unit and integration testing using **Robot Framework**, achieving **95%** test coverage and enhancing code reliability.
• Collaborated on technical documentation, ensuring clarity in system design specifications and facilitating smoother onboarding for new team members.
• Used **Git** for version control, enabling efficient collaboration within the development team and maintaining a clean codebase with a robust branching strategy.
• Engaged in Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) practices, significantly reducing release cycles by **60%**.

• Developed backend services using **Node.js** and **Golang**, enhancing system performance by achieving a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Implemented **Queuing systems** for improved request handling, ensuring a **98% timely notification rate** for critical issues with the notification system built using **Kafka**.
• Created a customer insights dashboard leveraging **Next.js** and **D3.js**, resulting in a **20%** improvement in resolution rates.
• Established a robust CI/CD pipeline with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, guaranteeing a reliable and consistent release process.
• Deployed applications on **AWS EC2** utilizing **Docker** and **Terraform**, effectively reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
• Emphasized **Unit testing** and **Integration testing** to enhance code quality and maintainability across the platform.

- Developed scalable backend solutions using **Node.js** and **Golang**, enhancing performance by 30%.
- Implemented **Docker** containers for seamless application deployment, resulting in a deployment time reduction of 25%.
- Designed and maintained SQL databases including **AzureSQL** and **PostgreSQL**, achieving a 98% uptime.
- Employed **Redis** for caching, which improved response times by 20%.
- Utilized **queuing systems** to ensure message integrity and maintain application reliability during traffic spikes.
- Conducted unit testing and integration testing using **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and **Robot Framework**, reducing bugs by 30%.
- Collaborated on CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes, improving overall team efficiency by 15%.
- Authored clear technical documentation in **Polish language**, ensuring knowledge transfer and team alignment.
- Developed and maintained frontend applications using **Angular** and **Next.js**, improving load times by 40%.
- Adopted serverless solutions for flexibility and scalability, optimizing cloud resource utilization across environments.

skills:

	Java, JavaScript, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, Golang

	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js

	RESTful API design

	Serverless solutions, AWS Lambda

	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, AzureSQL

	Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Unit testing, Integration testing, Technical documentation, Queuing systems, Robot Framework, Polish language
